00020 #include "Centroid3D.h"

00034 Eigen::Vector3d Centroid3D::computeCentroid(brics_3d::PointCloud3D *inCloud){
00035         Eigen::Vector3d centroid;
00036         double tempX;
00037         double tempY;
00038         double tempZ;
00039         int count = 0;
00040 
00041         centroid[0] = 0;
00042         centroid[1] = 0;
00043         centroid[2] = 0;
00044 
00045         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inCloud->getSize(); i++){
00046                 tempX = (*inCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00047                 tempY = (*inCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00048                 tempZ = (*inCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00049 
00050                 if(!isnan(tempX) && !isinf(tempX) && !isnan(tempY) && !isinf(tempY) &&
00051                                 !isnan(tempZ) && !isinf(tempZ) ) {
00052                         centroid[0] = centroid[0] + tempX;
00053                         centroid[1] = centroid[1] + tempY;
00054                         centroid[2] = centroid[2] + tempZ;
00055                         count++;
00056                 }
00057         }
00058 
00059         if (count == 0) {
00060                 centroid[0] = 0;
00061                 centroid[1] = 0;
00062                 centroid[2] = 0;
00063                 LOG(WARNING) << "Centroid3D: point cloud is empty. Returning (0,0,0).";
00064         } else {
00065                 centroid[0] = centroid[0] / count;
00066                 centroid[1] = centroid[1] / count;
00067                 centroid[2] = centroid[2] / count;
00068         }
00069 
00070         return centroid;
00071 }
00072 
00073 }
